constituent: clod, soil, dirt, ground, ghost, oni, drop, brains, rice field, human legs, elbow
koohiiStory1: Without any weapons, our only defense was to throw clods of dirt at the advancing oni horde. (Adapted from dingomick because zombie was used as a primitive for drag+rag).
koohiiStory2: All too often I find myself vaccuming clods of dirt with my Dirt Devil.
words: 塊(かたまり): lump, mass, clod, cluster
